item.title: Kalph Queen help
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

I would like to know how to make an npc spawn somewhere when you kill some other npc,
For example…
I kill kalph queen (bug form) and the kalph queen (fly form) will spawn, I know this is possible cause i’ve seen anny servers having it

thanx
~
Linus

and if it helps:

My codes in npchandler.java looks a bit like this.

[code] }
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { //kbd
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = 3221;
                            ppl.teleportToY = 3219;
                            ppl.addItem(964, 1);
                            }[/code]

Read full topic
